Background

This page is intended to provide the reader with any theoretical knowledge or other concepts that form the basis of your package. This page can include equations, figures, flowcharts, etc. for a better understanding of the theory behind the package along with any code snippets necessary to explain the software design.

Referencing using bib files

You can add references in the references.bib file and cite them in the page like this [PGH11]. You can also include a list of references cited at the end as shown below.

Bibliography

[PGH11]

Fernando Perez, Brian E Granger, and John D Hunter. Python: an ecosystem for scientific computing. Computing in Science & Engineering, 13(2):13–21, 2011.
